w:r.w:t: This is a 3D PC-based first-person horror game developed for my Final Year Project using Unity to study player tension and engagement. I implemented three enemy behavior systems using Unity’s AI navigation system: constant-chasing, jump-scare, and scene-triggered chasing.

This is a creative puzzle ball game developed using Unreal Engine with narrative elements. I implemented core gameplay systems, including ball movement, interaction, item collection and simple puzzle mechanics.
This is a 3D PC-based third-person action-adventure game developed using Unreal Engine. I implemented environment design and waypoint-based navigation using Unreal Blueprints.

This is a 3D PC-based multiplayer PvP FPS game in a backrooms-themed environment using Unity and Photon. I implemented core gameplay mechanics, including shooting, ammo refilling, point collection and health recovery.
This game trailer shows a 3D PC-based multiplayer

adventure game set in a historical-themed environment. I implemented core gameplay systems, including shooting, special skills, spot hiding, item collection and interaction and enemy chasing using Unity’s AI navigation (

I developed a 3D endless runner game set in a Halloween-themed environment. I implemented core gameplay mechanics, including running and jumping movement, lane-swiping controls, obstacle avoidance, coin collection, point-tracking system and endless track spawning system

This is a 3D PC-based open-world third-person adventure game with five levels developed using Unity. I implemented core puzzle gameplay systems, including interaction, item collection, puzzle-trigger mechanics and multiple puzzle managers for different puzzle types (sequence-based, maze-based, and jigsaw puzzles)

I developed a 3D narrative-driven ball game with an eyeball protagonist across two levels using Unity for the first time. I implemented core gameplay systems, including ball movement, item collection and

This is a 3D PC-based FPS game developed using Unity with three levels/ It Implemented core gameplay systems, including shooting mechanics, ammo refilling, enemy attack behavior, health and damage systems and environment design.

This is a simple AR greeting card created using Unity’s built-in Vuforia Engine to celebrate the Halloween festival. It features engaging interactions, animations and mini-games designed to provide a fun and enjoyable experience for the receiver.

This is a simple AR business card created using Unity’s built-in Vuforia Engine to introduce myself through fun and engaging interactions and animations. It presents my basic personal information, portfolio and hobby, allowing others to learn more about me in an interactive and memorable way.

This is an AR storybook application based on The Three Little Pigs for children aged 7–12 years old developed using Unity’s built-in Vuforia Engine. It implemented simple interaction systems and mini-games to support immersive and engaging storytelling for children.

This is a 3D VR survival-themed game set on a deserted island developed using Unity. I implemented core gameplay systems, including interaction and item collection using XR Grab Interactable and XR Socket Interactor scripts.
I created an underwater monument environment design using Unity terrain and online assets. This environment is used as one of the level
I created a human village and core crystal monuments environment design using Unreal Engine terrain. This environment is used as one of the level
in the game “The Last Light of Divinity”.
I modeled a study room using Autodesk Maya, including a study table, gaming chair, small desk, book rack, shelves, and other essential props that fit the study room theme.
I modeled a poor house with a cyberpunk background style using Autodesk Maya. I also assign texture and materials to the model using Autodesk Maya.
I created a 3D animation for stationeries in Autodesk Maya using keyframing and motion path techniques.
I created a 3D animation of walk cycle and run cycle for both human and animal using Autodesk Maya by animating the rig of the model.

This short 2D animation was created using Adobe Animate. It tells the story of a depressed girl who struggles with academic pressure and portrays her emotional breakdown and suicidal thoughts, aiming to highlight mental health issues faced by students.

This short 2D animation continues the story of “Life of a Depressed Girl” created using Adobe Animate. It depicts a magical journey of the girl in a cat kingdom that helps to guide her toward healing and recovery from depression.
I created a 150-second long-take video with horror-themed narrative elements. The video was not further edited in terms of cuts but only blending visual effects and sound effects were adjusted using
This video is a short travel promotional video about Japan country edited using Adobe After Effects to implement the techniques of masking, rotoscoping and keyframing and blending effects.
This documentary short film explores a sunset industry by visiting and interviewing the last Chinese Batu Nisan carver, documenting his craft and preserving the story of a fading tradition.

This short film presents a horror and suspense narrative centered on a group of teammates discussing their ideas through an online meeting. The blend of reality and imagined scenes enhances the sense of mystery and tension.

Based on the image, I created a soundscape using Adobe Audition that present an imaginative scenario where humans and dinosaurs coexist in the same environment, inspired by the “Jurassic World” film series.

I created a short radio station opening jingle for a fictional K-pop radio channel using Adobe Premium Pro by blending different K-pop music styles to create an energetic and engaging introduction that attracts listeners.

I created a radio play production focusing on McDonald’s drive thru service to promote the concept of taking a brief, relaxing moment during a McDonald’s drive-thru experience as a way to escape from the pressures of a daily routine.

This 10-minutes short firm used the 2023 Chinese film “No More Bets” as the primary inspiration and footage source for our storytelling project to reinterpret the scenes and style to create a short comedy video using our own edited sound effect and human voice-over.
combines both workout and nutrition tracking functions while also offering a more user-friendly interface to enhance the overall user experience.
I created a promotional flyer for a fictional

Gryffindor product collection using Adobe InDesign. The design incorporates a red and gold color palette to reflect Gryffindor’s iconic identity, while maintaining a clean and modern layout to enhance visual impact and brand appeal.

This newsletter showcases the Disney Special Collection series, celebrating and promoting the 20th anniversary of the “Lilo & Stitch” film. The design concept is inspired by the Hawaii culture, reflecting the film’s setting on the island of

, Hawaii. For the inner pages, a scrapbook-style layout is used, combining text with images of key movie moments. The final page of the newsletter uses a large image of Stitch peeking from behind a wall, reflecting the playful Disney aesthetic style.
I redesigned the movie poster of
by transforming its original fairy-tale theme into a horror concept. Through dark color grading
and atmospheric composition, I reimagined the film’s tone to create a suspenseful and unsettling visual identity.
movie poster by transforming its original bright and playful tone into a horror concept. Through dark color grading
dramatic shadows and unsettling visual composition, I reimagined the emotional narrative into a psychological horror atmosphere.
